title: 13.4.3 Penetration testing preparation
body:
# Objective
Prepare application for third-party penetration testing by hardening security, fixing known issues, and documenting the scope.

## Requirements
- Conduct internal security review
- Fix all known security vulnerabilities
- Harden API endpoints and authentication
- Implement rate limiting and DDoS protection
- Review and update security policies
- Prepare penetration test scope document
- Set up isolated test environment
- Provide test credentials and access
- Document application architecture for testers
- Review and remediate findings
- Obtain penetration test report

## Acceptance Criteria
- Internal security audit completed
- All high/critical vulnerabilities fixed
- API security hardened (auth, rate limits)
- Pen test scope document approved
- Test environment ready with sample data
- Penetration test completed by certified firm
- All findings remediated or accepted
- Final report obtained and stored
- Remediation verified with retest

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #160 (SSL setup), #161 (Security scanning)
- Related: #163 (SOC 2 readiness)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 13
**Time:** 3 weeks
**Complexity:** High
